resources.string:
Use your phone as a remote control device for your computer over Wifi!

Main features :
 - Mouse control (move, click and wheel)
 - Keyboard control
 - File explorer (view directories and launch files)
 - Secure (password) connection
 - Screen capture (but it is NOT a VNC viewer)

Press, drag and hold the screen to move the mouse.

To click, just press briefly the screen.

To hold your click, press and hold the screen (do not move!).
After the vibration, you can move.
To release your click, do a simple click.

Manual click buttons are available around the screen.
Hold a button one second, and it will stay pressed.

To use the mouse wheel, slide the right part of the screen (up and down).
Press the \"Get server\" button to get the server on your computer.\nPress the \"Settings\" button to configure the connection (host, port) and your preferences (sensitivity, acceleration, ... ).\n

Now, read the usage instructions below.
Then press the "Back" button on your phone to start using PRemoteDroid.

You must download and install the server part of PRemoteDroid on your PC.

Open your web browser on your computer and type this URL :

http://code.google.com/p/premotedroid/

Go into the "Downloads" tab, and download the server file.
Unzip the file in a folder.

Run the server (PRemoteDroid-Server.exe on Windows, or PRemoteDroid-Server.jar on Linux and Mac OS).

The icon in the system tray allows you to configure the server (password and port).

Press the "back" button on your phone to go back to the previous screen.
Bluetooth is not available on your phone (only Android 2.0+)
Can not connect to remote bluetooth device
It is the first time you launch PRemoteDroid.\nDo you want to read the help?
It is a new version of PRemoteDroid.\nYou should download the server again.
